SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssignmentAnalyzer
The AssignmentAnalyzer class extracts the methods, constructors, and attributes from Java classes and files for a given assignment.
Command
 
CreatePDF
CreatePDF class responsible for creating PDF documents and merging multiple PDFs.
FileHandler
The FileHandler class provides methods for handling files, including unzipping, appending package names to Java files, extracting text from PDFs, and parsing rubric text from formatted data.
GenerateReportListener
ActionListener implementation for the "Generate Report" button in the GUIWindow class.
GUIWindow
Represents a GUI window for interacting with the application.
HelpbtnListener
The HelpbtnListener class implements the ActionListener to respond to user interaction specifically designed to handle help button events in a GUIWindow.
Main
 
ProcessAssignmentCommand
The ProcessAssignmentCommand class is responsible for executing a sequence of tasks, including marking attributes, methods, constructors, and generating a PDF report.
ProcessFolderCommand
The ProcessFolderCommand class is responsible for executing tasks related to handling files in a folder, including unzipping the folder and appending package information to Java files.
ProcessFolderListener
The ProcessFolderListener class is responsible for triggering the execution of folder processing tasks when the associated button is clicked in the GUIWindow.
ProcessMarkingpdfListener
The ProcessMarkingpdfListener class is responsible for triggering the execution of marking PDF processing tasks when the associated button is clicked in the GUIWindow.
ProcessPdfCommand
The ProcessPdfCommand class is responsible for executing the necessary steps to process a marking PDF, including extracting rubric text and parsing the extracted text to generate formatted data.
TestSuite
